content.en: Video watermarking: Researchers have developed various algorithms for video watermarking to protect copyright, trace pirates, and authenticate content. These algorithms use techniques like discrete wavelet transform (DWT), mapping energy, inter-frame differential energy, hybrid digital watermarking, adaptive mapping energy, blind video data-hiding, block-matching, singular value decomposition (SVD), 1D discrete Fourier transform (DFT), Radon transform, quantization-based watermarking, slope-based embedding, QR decomposition, and entropy analysis. These algorithms offer features such as low computational complexity, strong robustness against attacks, high watermark payload, imperceptibility, and resilience against intentional and unintentional attacks.
content.da: Video-watermarking: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til video-watermarking for at beskytte ophavsret, spore pirater og autentificere indhold. Disse algoritmer anvender teknikker som diskret wavelet-transform (DWT), mapping af energi, inter-frame differential energi, hybrid digital watermarking, adaptiv mapping af energi, blind video-data skjulning, blok-matching, singular value dekomponering (SVD), 1D diskret Fourier-transform (DFT), Radon-transform, kvantisering-baseret watermarking, hældningsbaseret indlejring, QR-dekomponering og entropianalyse. Disse algoritmer tilbyder funktioner såsom lav beregningskompleksitet, stærk robusthed over for angreb, høj watermark-payload, usynlighed og modstandskraft mod både intentionelle og utilsigtede angreb.
